keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICA AND NEAR EAST AREAS

headline.main: SYRIA'S SUBMISSION IS LAID TO WEYGAND; General Sent to Win Over French Officials to Petain's Stand

lead_paragraph: ISTANBUL, Turkey, July 2 (London Times dispatch)--General Maxime Weygand is reported to have arrived at Damascus to deal with the situation in Syria. According to information from foreign sources, Germany and Italy are sending representatives to Beirut.
